name: Salary Component Classification
query:
SELECT 
    tss.name, 
    tss.workflow_state, 
    CASE  
		WHEN docstatus = 0 THEN 'Draft'
		WHEN parentfield = 2 THEN 'Cancelled'	
		ELSE 'Submitted'
	END AS document_status, 
    tss.employee, 
    tss.employee_name, 
    tss.attendance_device_id, 
    tss.branch, 
    tss.company, 
    tss.end_date, 
    tss.gross_monthly_salary,
    (SELECT tsd.default_amount FROM `tabSalary Detail` tsd WHERE tsd.parent = tss.name AND tsd.abbr = 'B') AS basic,
    (SELECT tsd.default_amount FROM `tabSalary Detail` tsd WHERE tsd.parent = tss.name AND tsd.abbr = 'HRA') AS hra,
    (SELECT tsd.default_amount FROM `tabSalary Detail` tsd WHERE tsd.parent = tss.name AND tsd.abbr = 'CCA') AS cca,
    (SELECT tsd.default_amount FROM `tabSalary Detail` tsd WHERE tsd.parent = tss.name AND tsd.abbr = 'TA') AS ta,
    (SELECT tsd.default_amount FROM `tabSalary Detail` tsd WHERE tsd.parent = tss.name AND tsd.abbr = 'WA') AS wa,
    (SELECT tsd.default_amount FROM `tabSalary Detail` tsd WHERE tsd.parent = tss.name AND tsd.abbr = 'PF') AS pf,
    (SELECT tsd.default_amount FROM `tabSalary Detail` tsd WHERE tsd.parent = tss.name AND tsd.abbr = 'ESI') AS esi
FROM `tabSalary Slip` tss 
WHERE 
     DATE(tss.end_date) = %(end_date)s
